pageProduct.name: Optislim VLCD Meal Replacement Shake Salted Caramel 21x43g Sachets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Nutritionally complete meal replacement when used 3 times a day for accelerated weight loss.

Warnings

Not suitable for pregnant and breastfeeding women, children and adolescents. If you have any medical conditions or are taking medication, please consult a Healthcare Professional before using this product.

Common Uses

For the dietary management of obesity

Ingredients

Wheat Protein (Gluten), Sugar, Milk Solids, Fructose, Soybean Oil Powder [Refined Soybean Oil, Glucose Syrup Solids, Milk Protein, Emulsifier (451i), Anti-caking Agent (551), Antioxidant (307b)], Minerals [Calcium Hydrogen Phosphate, Potassium Dihydrogen Phosphate, Magnesium Oxide, Ferric Pyrophosphate, Chromium
Chloride, Potassium Iodide, Sodium Molybdate, Zinc Oxide, Sodium Selenite, Copper Sulphate, Manganese Sulphate], Flavours, Salt, Mineral Salt (Potassium Chloride), Natural Colours (150a, 100), Vitamins [Vitamin C, Vitamin E, Vitamin B3, Vitamin A, Vitamin B5, Vitamin D3, Vitamin B6, Folic Acid, Vitamin B12, Vitamin B2,
Biotin, Vitamin B1]. CONTAINS GLUTEN, MILK AND SOY.

Directions

Replace each meal with one sachet, up to three meals can be replaced each day. Mix 200ml of cold water with contents of sachet and shake or blend to dissolve, drink immediately. Once prepared any unused portions should be discarded, it should not be stored for use at a later time.
